description:
<p>This is an exciting opportunity for recommended candidates who are looking to work as Bank Midwife at the Chelsea and Westminster Foundation Trust. <br /><br />We are looking for dedicated staff who are willing to provide exceptional patient care. If you are a high calibre midwife with a passion for exceeding patients expectation we would welcome your application.<br /><br />This is an excellent opportunity for a talented individual with an appetite for making a patient’s day to join the team in one of the UKs most successful and progressive NHS Foundation Trusts. <br /><br />You will have had demonstrable clinical competencies, and bring an outstanding co do attitude which has the patient experience at everything that you do. You will be able to establish your credibility with multiple stakeholders including consultants and midwives and enjoy being part of a high performing team.<br /><br />You will have had experience of private and NHS settings, excellent communication and interpersonal skills along with well-developed people skills. Most of all, you will be able to motivate and engage others to ensure that the services we provide supports the Trust’s values, as well as having a pioneering approach that is not afraid to challenge convention and traditional ways of working to provide the best care possible for our families.</p>
<p>If you are a committed, motivated reliable trained midwife who would enjoy the flexibility that ad hoc work brings working in this busy, diverse hospital this may be the job for you!</p>
